original_title: Falling in Love Like in The Movie
overview: Hana just lost Arman, her husband who died because of cancer. In the midst of her grief, Bagus, a  radio announcer who is also Hana’s best friend during High School, is back in Hana’s life. Bagus  offers a new love story to Hana and tries to help her to get out from the shadow of Arman. While  Hana, who is still grieving, decides to shut herself down, even though in the end she realized that  what she wanted is to fall in love simply, like in the movies or series that she often watched
title: Falling in Love Like in The Movie
